message:
Hello Geeks
VERY URGENT PLEASE

I have a website hosted on vps on godaddy , the website has a signup process , in the second step of the signup process which has very little amount of fields including only a poster file upload  and 3 other fields , I tried doing the process from egypt it works fine , from several testers accounts , so after that two accounts from Morrocco and Poland tried to go through the signup process but they failed in the second step , (Ajax request i guess because they said it keep saying loading) i tried to check with a friend in Norway and he was able to go through the signup process normally , what should be the problem is it possible that both of them have a connectivity problem ?? I guess not ã€€ Please any help

data.message:
You should always be able to reproduce the issue in order to properly troubleshoot it. 

Test again and again and set the debugging tools in action to capture any supporting info when you hit the issue again.
the two accounts that was not able to go through the signup process step 2 are from Morocco and Poland but a profile was created normally from a friend in Norway

can you get information about the environment of error. 
like what is device typt which browser and so on ...
I was just trying to take the permission from my client to do that right now, hopefully they agrees , what are you suspecting
Get the HTTP request and response from their web browsers, then you have something to inspect.
I believe it's a DNS issue.
